name: Methos

ski.name: DARK RUSH
desc: Methos dashes a short distance in the target direction and increases the damage of his next normal attack.
study: Dash and increase damage of next normal attack

ski.name: ENDLESS TERROR
desc: Methos unleashes his true strength and deals continuous damage to nearby enemies for a period of time. Methos recovers Health based on the damage dealt by this ability.

ski.name: DARK BARRIER
desc: Methos summons 3 barriers of darkness each time he kills an enemy hero or 3 non-hero enemy units. Enemies that come in contact with the barriers will sustain continuous damage. Enemy heroes will receive an additional Slow effect.
update: Damage â†‘ Barrier â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: HEALTH DECAY
desc: Enemy units that take damage from Methos will continue to lose Health and reduce Health Regen effect by 50% for 5s. Active: Deal a portion of passive damage already suffered by enemy units within range. Passive effect is lost when ability is cooling down.
data: Deal 10% of target's lost Health in bonus damage

story: Methos was struck by an intriguing thought: he could seduce the most desirous, promising ever-increasing power and money - all for the simple price of a countryman's soul. He felt amused when humans took up arms to get what they believed was important.
